persName.roleName: King of Great Britain and Ireland

note.p: Birth: Buckingham Palace, London, England (21 August 1765)
Honours: KG 1782; Earl of Munster and Duke of Clarence 1789
References: Paul A Tunbridge, 'Jean Andre De Luc, FRS (1727-1817)' in NR 1971 vol 26 pp 15-33
John Thomas, 'Josiah Wedgwood's Portrait Medallions of Fellows of the Royal Society' in NR 1963 vol 18 pp 45-53, plate
